pages.subtext: A flowering weed, with a conspicuous beige-colored base. Found in normal climates.
Similar to normal Potato patches, but with large flowers. Found in colder climates.
A large bush with small yellow flowers. Found mostly on beaches.
A type of beet with much larger leaves. Found mostly on beaches.
A thick cluster of Allium flowers usually has an onion bulb under them. Found in normal climates.
Non-spiked floor vines covered in tiny tomatoes. Found in warmer climates.
A thinner form of cultivated rice. Thrives in shallow puddles of water. Found mostly in jungles or swamps. You will harvest a rice panicle which you can open in a crafting table
